scripts.update-clipit-abi: cp hardhat/artifacts/contracts/ClipIt.sol/ClipIt.json app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/ && cp hardhat/typechain/ClipIt.d.ts app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/ && cp hardhat/typechain/commons.ts app/src/lib/contracts/ClipIt/
scripts.update-auction-abi: cp hardhat/artifacts/contracts/AuctionHouse.sol/AuctionHouse.json app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse && cp hardhat/typechain/AuctionHouse.d.ts app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse/&& cp hardhat/typechain/commons.ts app/src/lib/contracts/AuctionHouse/
